mainInformation.ingredients: Coffee of both varieties Arabica and Robusta, which comes from different regions in the world (not in Europe).
mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

usageInformation.preparationInstructions: To prepare a perfect espresso, it is recommended to use an espresso coffee machine.

remarks.value: Produced and distributed in Switzerland by:Caffè Chicco d'Oro di Eredi Rino Valsangiacomo SAVia Motta 2 - CH-6828 Balerna - www.chiccodoro.comDistributed by:Chicco d'Oro Italia SrlVia Volta 34 - I-22071 Cadorago (CO) - www.chiccodoro.itCaffè Chicco d'Oro GmbHIn de Tarpen 51 - D-22848 Norderstedt - www.chiccodoro.deCaffè Chicco d'Oro Ristretto VertriebsgesmbHWalgaustrasse 13 - A-6833 Klaus - www.chiccodoro.atBest before: month and yearLot number Composition of packages according to the decision 97/129/EU:- Recycling-code for packet: C/LDPE90

Store the product in a cool, dry place.During its transport and storage, avoid any action that could compromise the integrity of the packaging. In this way, the product remains well protected against external agents, including possible physical, chemical and microbiological contaminants that could promote product spoilage.After opening the package, store the product in a well-sealed containers or in its original, well-sealed packaging, in a dry place, protected from light and away from sources of heat. Consume the product within a few days.
